title: About
intro: Hi there! I'm Prakash Raj, a passionate web developer and data scientist based in Jaipur.
description: Currently pursuing my Bachelor's in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence at ICFAI University Jaipur. I love creating stunning websites and solving complex data problems.
With hands-on experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and various data science tools, I strive to create solutions that are both visually appealing and technically sound.
